html:
10.12.18  3:02 am   Have you switched back to answering questions in the morning instead of the evening?

     it goes around gradually

10.12.18  2:32 am   I am sick and sleepless and miserable right now. Could you remind me of something beautiful in the universe? 

     you?

10.12.18  1:32 am   What's your favorite song you produced so far?

     i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

10.12.18  12:10 am   Pigeons?

     that makes sense

10.11.18  11:13 pm   how did it feel to have your first taste of controversy

     kind of like a bar mitzvah of sorts

10.11.18  10:30 pm   Whats ur next video

     hold on i have to throw eggs at the wall first. that's not the video, and i'm not actually doing that they are imaginary eggs

10.11.18  9:55 pm   Would you ever make a joy of painting style show??

     yes

10.11.18  9:18 pm   10.10.18  3:44 pm     Freedom from what?

     not from. to

10.11.18  9:10 pm   What are your feelings towards there being different genres of music?

     that line of thinking seems to collapse very rapidly as soon as you walk out of your front door

     I mean, it helps organize it, but it seems somewhat limiting, especially when something seems in between different genres, or doesn't really fit any pre-existing genre.   Shouldn't music be allowed to be as free as, well, music.

     always was

     But it can help one express what a certain song is like.

     that actually kind of reminds me of all language and communication in general. endless hours of fun for the whole family, yet none of it technically holds up in court

10.11.18  9:08 pm   How do you learn improv?  I'm classically trained and cannot function without sheet music.

     start by just spending some time with the instrument and seeing what you can do with it

10.11.18  9:07 pm   When are we going to get a look at your vast collection of goats

     it's just me. i'm the goat

10.11.18  8:53 pm   where the ideal place to listen to your music

     in the world

10.11.18  8:41 pm   why the darn are your song so hecking catchy?? gosh!

     it might be a survival strategy

10.11.18  8:37 pm   What is the greatest mystery of life?

     how it technically got started

10.11.18  8:35 pm   What's the title for the next video

     i can't tell you

10.11.18  8:34 pm   Who inspired you to use this design on your website? 

     i am always mind blown when i find a website that actually dares not put anything between you and the content. it is so refreshing i could just scream around the entire universe

10.11.18  8:23 pm   I posted some artwork then got embarrassed and deleted it.  But then I discovered someone had said something nice about it right before I deleted it.  Now his comment in just hanging out there in space attached to nothing.  What do I do now?

     make more. or wait actually just re post the thing, and then make more and post that too

10.11.18  8:17 pm   What is your policy on capital letters? Do you have anything in particular, or do you just use them when they seem necessary?

     my main priority is communication

10.11.18  8:04 pm   Seeing as New Canaan was based on a real event, could you give us some background? Why did you go to New Canaan? What were you thinking about during the time that prompted you to make it a song? Is "you" anybody in particular? Thanks.

     it was the second time doing it. i did another location previously. the idea was to get out of the city on a train, bring a song book and write a song along the way. i did it several times, new canaan was the second time

10.11.18  7:32 pm   if you miraculously completed all the hundreds projects and songs you've ever planned on doing right now what do you think you would do next?  would you begin writing new songs and projects, and if so, why?

     the new ones i haven't written yet are part of the plan

10.11.18  7:24 pm   sometimes when i wake up my first thought is "eat chicken for breakfast" what does it mean

     seems pretty straight forward to me

10.11.18  7:09 pm   what is your favorite type of milk?

     spilt

10.11.18  6:18 pm   is there a particular video that you've made that you like the most?

     i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

10.11.18  6:15 pm   Why don't you post in your notebook on here anymore?

     i do, but i also tend to make videos now instead, which is what i wished i could do back when i wrote most of the contents of the notebook section

10.11.18  5:18 pm   I'm flattered that you write so many songs about me but have you considered indulging and writing a couple more about yourself?

     sure

10.11.18  5:08 pm   i went outside crying and the wind sent a teensy twister into my yard that made me laugh, and as soon as i laughed it tossed leaves high in the air and completely stopped. how much of a fruit bat am i for thinking i created it?

     everyone created everything

10.11.18  4:56 pm   Should i lock up the rainbow for its crimes

     if you can figure out where it is

10.11.18  3:56 pm   What is the circle of fifths and what is it used for? 

      start on a note, then go a fifth away, then another fifth, then another fifth, etc etc. all those notes in that order. circle of fifths. you can use it however you want. it's kind of like the calendar

10.11.18  3:50 pm   Will you ever make extended versions of previous short songs?

     yes but it's slightly more important for me to make new songs

10.11.18  3:16 pm   what's the importantest thing in life

     you

10.11.18  3:01 pm   Hi Bill just figured this out and I'm excited; triplets are when you fit three notes into the space of two of those same notes. So like

3 eighth notes in 2 eighth notes (=1
quarter note

3 quarter notes in 2 quarter notes (=1 half note)

Which is interesting because we call them triplets, which suggests that they are three parts of one thing. They are thirds. But it's kinda 2/3, if you're going note-ratio wise-so do you think they should really be called two-thirdlets?

     good luck trying to explain to someone how many you have

      Or do you have some grander musical wisdom to lead you to a different conclusion?

     regular notes are twins

10.11.18  2:14 pm   I feel like school is sucking the creativity out of me because It makes me feel like I have to do things a certain way but I know there are other ways to do things and it feels like I am becoming less capable of combating this have you ever gone through anything like this?

     yes

      if you have do you have any advice?  

     just find a safe space where you are least distracted, and start working on some thoughts / ideas / writings that may one day end up on your name dot com

10.11.18  2:00 pm   Do your songs have a specific meaning you are trying to convey or are we meant to find our own meaning in them?

     the specific meaning of doing songs is that songs are a very powerful and fun tool. that's why i am doing them, i found this out from seeing others do them, and i hope others find out from me as well

10.11.18  1:44 pm   Do vegetables have fruits?

     i'm not sure but that sounds plausible

10.11.18  1:27 pm   is mainstream music bad

     all music is bad

10.11.18  1:26 pm   if im tired, what should i do

     can you give me multiple choice

10.11.18  12:42 pm   are you putting the same thought process and energy on videos now that you have a 2 week schedule or is the stress getting more in the way?

     it's better now

10.11.18  12:40 pm   What is a completely legal but also really creepy thing to do?

     have sex?

10.11.18  12:20 pm   what do you do to stay motivated even when you want to stop making content

     i've never wanted to stop

10.11.18  11:37 am   I've just viewed a large chunk of the expert mode content (but not all of it). I especially like this: https://billwurtz.com/red%206%20windows%203.png. What can you say about it?

     this

10.11.18  11:02 am   i need some birthday gift ideas

     how about a swim suit

10.11.18  10:56 am   Trousers?

     that makes sense

10.11.18  10:31 am   you once said that doubting a project just means you are confused about how to proceed. I really like and agree with this, but am deeply unsure how to figure out how to proceed in these times.

     what is the origin of the project

10.11.18  10:30 am   favorite 2018 album?

     people still make albums?

10.11.18  10:14 am   ohhhhhh can you say a bad word

     they're all bad

10.11.18  9:58 am   what is a flavour?

     it's like a colour of taste

10.11.18  9:40 am   what chord is most disdainful?

     all the notes under 55hz at the same time

10.11.18  8:13 am   What separates a fruit from a vegetable 

     politics

10.11.18  7:41 am   Are you going to produce spooky content for Halloween?

     maybe

10.11.18  6:07 am   I had a dream that I was at a party and you were there. We got into conversation about Buddhism (you mentioned you weren't a Buddhist and didn't really understand it), and then somebody came up and put yogurt in your hair. I got up to fight them for doing that, but you said to leave it and not worry about it. Was my dream version of you accurate, and what would you do if a stranger put yogurt in your hair?

     i am good at instinctively blocking it with my arm, but if they were able to some how do it anyway, i would try to understand why they did it but also quickly shower and leave, wait a minute why do i have time to be at a party, i'm trying to do 10 weeks of work every 2 weeks
